Su mayor anhelo seguir creciendo y mejorar la raza de sus vacas, como también crecer en el negocio. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “abejitas” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde se siente contenta de  ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Flor de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para su próximo sembrío de papa.
texts.en:
Flor, age 47, is a valiant woman. Recently widowed and having to take care of her three children by herself, she spends every day trying to feed her household. Flor lives in the town of Huanchac. Since suffering the loss of her husband, she had to take over the responsibilities of her home and her children. Over time, she has focused her efforts and now has several heads of cattle and sheep as well as some land on which she grows vegetables, potatoes, and quinoa. After harvesting each crop, her sales have done very well. Flor keeps some of her vegetables, but most of them are sold to her neighbors. She also sells her goods in the capital. What she enjoys most about farming is being able to survey her land in order to keep her crops healthy. This guarantees a good crop and profitable earnings. Within the next few months, she will take her harvest to the market in her city. Her greatest wish is to continue growing and improving the breed of her cattle, as well as grow in her business.

Flor is a member of the Communal Bank “Abejitas” (Little Bees) and is receiving her fourth loan with MFP. She is pleased to be part of her Communal Bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive individuals. For this reason, she promises to be punctual with her loan payments. With the support she will receive, Flor will invest the money in the purchase of natural fertilizers for her next planting of potatoes.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Valencia - 26 Gpo. Sol Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario esta conformado por tres componentes Katherine, Marina y Deyvi, la señora marina se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños vive en la casa de sus papas con sus dos hijas el esposo se fue a la republica de Argentina a buscar un futuro mejor para sus hijas, el destino del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de ropa al por mayor por esta época de navidad ya que tiene mucha venta, Deyvi es cerrajero tiene su taller en la ciudad de el alto y vive con su hermana en la zona de el Tejar, con el dinero del crédito comprar equipo de sonido.  Katherine se dedica a la venta de comida en su domicilio de la zona del Tejar el crédito esta destinado a la compra de víveres, todos son personas responsables y trabajadoras agradecidos con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
This solidarity group consists of three members: Katherine, Marina, and Deyvi.

Sra. Marina sells children’s clothing. She lives at her parents’ house with her two daughters. Her husband went to Argentina in search of a better future for their children. Her loan will be used to buy clothing in bulk for the Christmas season since she has many sales during this time.

Deyvi is a locksmith who has his own shop in El Alto, where he lives with his sister in the District of El Tejar. The money from his loan will be used to buy sound equipment.

Katherine sells food from her home in the District of El Tejar. Her loan will be used to buy ingredients.

All of these individuals are responsible and hardworking. They are grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es: La Sra. Martha es una persona muy trabajadora la  cual actualmente se dedica a la venta de  ropa realizando la  compra  en la  ciudad  de Monterrey,  ya  que    cuenta  con una hermana  que  vive en la ciudad y  ella  realiza  viajes  para  adquirir  la  mercancía  ya  que  la  compra   a un menor  costo  y  esto le permite   brindar  a  sus  clientes precios  bajos  y  facilidades  de pago, agradece  el  apoyo  brindado para la realización de  su proyecto   ya  que  le permitirá  hacer  crecer  su negocio  obteniendo mayores  ingresos.
texts.en:
Sra. Martha is a hardworking individual who currently has a business selling clothes that she acquires in the city of Monterrey. She has a sister who lives in that city, so Martha makes trips to acquire the merchandise. She buys these goods at a lower cost, which enables her to offer her customers good prices and payment options.

Martha is grateful for the support so that she can carry out her project and grow her business, thereby enabling her to generate more income.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Pridon

texts.en:
Pridon lives in the village of Bashi, West Georgia. He is 33 years old, married and lives with his wife, Maya, and parents. The main source of income for the family is agriculture. They have four milk cows, producing and selling, on average, 62kg of cheese per month. Along with agriculture, Pridon is busy with buying and reselling bread. He purchases in Samtredia (nearby town) 400 loaves of bread each morning and takes them with his car to nearby villages. He sells directly to the villagers, as well as to grocery stores. Total average monthly income of the family is 800 Laris, including the monthly pension of Pridon’s mother. 

Recently Pridon’s car went out of service and he had to stop his work. Pridon has requested credit for fixing the car, in order to continue his business and provide for his family.

loans.use: to pay for car repair service so that he can continue selling bread in nearby villages.

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.es:
Don Bernardo es una persona muy trabajadora ya tiene 40 años de edad, esta casado desde hace 7 años, tiene dos hijos de 5 y 2 años de edad, vive en Colonia Los Pinos de Choloma, Cortes.
Desde hace siete años se dedica a comprar y vender metales para reciclar tales como: chatarras de artículos y vehículos, desperdicios  de hierro, aluminio, cobre, bronce, hierro molido y recolecta plásticos, para venderlos  a una empresa  de reciclaje de estos materiales.  Compra a un precio y lo vende a otro generándole buena ganancia. Todo el día le dedica a este negocio desde las 7:00 de la mañana hasta las 5:00 de la tarde.
Se siente apoyado por los préstamos que le ha brindado ODEF, este es el segundo préstamo y lo necesita para invertir en compra de vehículos chatarra y desperdicios de hierro, bronce, cobre, plástico y aluminio, para la venta.
Su sueño es obtener un vehículo propio para esta actividad que realiza, y crecer en su negocio.
texts.en:
Bernardo is a very hardworking forty-year-old man.  He’s been married for seven years and has two children who are 5 and 2 years old.  He lives in the Los Pinos de Choloma neighborhood, Cortes.

For the last seven years he’s worked buying and selling recyclable metals like: junk metal and car parts, iron, aluminum, copper, bronze and ground iron scraps and he also collects plastics to sell to a recycling firm.  He buys them at one price and then sells them for another earning a good profit.  He spends all day in this business working from 7am until 5pm.

He feels supported by loans from ODEF.  This is the second one and he needs it to buy junk autos and iron, bronze, copper, plastic and aluminum scraps to sell.  His dream is to own a vehicle for his business and to grow in business.

loans.use: to buy recyclable materials.

loans.name: Maria Yolanda

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Maria; La socia ahora se encuentra trabajando en su propio pequeño negocio, la socia compra y vende quesos, morayas, papa en el mercado, la socia desearía seguir creciendo y ha encontrado una nueva forma de ocupar su tiempo y se siente feliz y desea el credito para invertir en la compra de productos como papa, moraya, queso para vender.
texts.en: Sra. Maria now works in her own business where she buys and sells cheeses, “morayas” (freeze-dried white potatoes), and regular potatoes at the market.  She wants to continue growing since she has found a new way to occupy her time.  Maria is happy and wants a loan to invest in the purchase of potatoes, “morayas”, and cheeses to sell.

loans.use: to purchase regular potatoes, freeze-dried white potatoes, and cheeses to sell.

loans.name: Ruben Felipe

texts.es: El Sr. Rubén es un hombre muy trabajador comenta que tiene quince años trabajando en una empresa de pinturas por lo cual a adquirido  conocimientos  en  el  ámbito, es  por  ello  que  decidió  emprender su  propio negocio de pinturas. actualmente se a  reconocido por  pintar  automóviles, por lo cual  necesita  realizar  la  compra  de un compresor para  continuar  laborando, agradece   el apoyo  brindado para   realizar  su proyecto  ya  que  podrá  hacer  su  sueño realidad.
texts.en:
Sr. Rubén is a hardworking gentleman who says that he was employed at a painting company for 15 years, which allowed him to acquire knowledge in this trade. For this reason, he decided to establish his own paint business. He is currently known for painting cars.

Rubén needs a loan to buy a compressor so that he can continue his work. He is grateful for the support that has been provided for his project so that he can make his dream a reality.

loans.use: to purchase a compressor.

loans.name: Robinson

texts.es: El joven Robinson a sus 20 años de edad tiene a su cargo una tienda que tomo en subarriendo desde hace tres años, luego de laborar en esta como empleado por varios años. Hoy día, el joven Robinson es quien atiende su negocio desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m durante toda la semana y vela porque marche bien. Este oficio lo aprendió de su familia quienes han sido siempre su apoyo y por quienes trabaja día a día arduamente con el ánimo de conseguir los ingresos suficientes para su sostenimiento. La tienda del señor Robinson esta con carencia de productos para lo cual el joven Robinson requiere de la compra de surtido. El sueño del joven Robinson es estudiar contabilidad y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Robinson is a young man who is 20 years of age. He took charge of a store that he subleased three years ago. Robinson had worked there as an employee for several years. Today he manages this business from 6am to 10pm every day of the week so that his venture does well. He learned this trade from his family, who has always been supportive of him. For this reason, Robinson works hard day after day and is motivated to earn sufficient income to support himself.

His store lacks an assortment of products, so he needs to buy inventory. Young Robinson’s dreams include studying accounting and expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Marvin Antonio

texts.es: Marvin está por finalizar sus estudios de Ingeniería en Computación, el préstamo solicitado será para pagar el curso para poder obtener su título. En un futuro el se ve trabajando en el área de informñatica de una empresa. Con esto optará a desarrollarse en otros ámbitos de mayor exigencia en informática. Para el la mejor satisfacción es poder servir al prójimo, es una persona responsable y emprendedrora. Para Marvin el hecho de haber egresado de su carrera fue un gran desafío para él.
texts.en:
Marvin is finishing his studies in Computer Engineering. The loan he is requesting will be used to pay for a course that he needs to obtain his degree. In the future, he sees himself working in the information technology department of a company. This will give him the option to develop in other areas of computer science that are in great demand. Serving others gives him the greatest satisfaction.

Marvin is a responsible and enterprising individual. Graduating and earning his degree will be a challenging accomplishment for him.

loans.use: to pay for a course needed to earn his degree.

loans.name: Emelita

texts.en:
Emelita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to purchase materials for the maintenance of her fishing boat. She has been in this business for 10 years. Emelita earns more income from food vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She hopes to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: To purchase materials for the maintenance of her fishing boat.

loans.name: Eva Maria

texts.es: Eva Raquel tiene 30 años, ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y ropa nueva. Tiene un hijo de 3 meses bajo su cargo, ella ha logrado brindarle las condiciones necesarias. El motivo de su crédito es que se acerca la temporada navideña y quiere abastecer su inventario. Así podrá comprar polvos, lápiz de uña, pintura de labios, cremas, tratamientos, pantalones, camisas, faldas, ropa interior entre otros.
texts.en: Eva Raquel, 30, has a business selling cosmetics and new clothing.  She has a 3-month old child who is in her care, and she has managed to provide for his needs.  The reason for this loan is that the Christmas season is approaching and she wants to stock up her inventory.  This way, she will be able to buy powders, nail polish, lipstick, creams, treatments, pants, shirts, skirts, underwear, and other products.

loans.use: to buy powders, nail polish, lipstick, creams, treatments, pants, shirts, skirts, underwear, and other products

loans.name: Cecilia Rosario

texts.es:
Cecilia es una persona joven, alegre, trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir a delante. cecilia vive con su esposo y dos hijos en San Gabriel, Provincia del Carchi al Norte de Ecuador. Trabaja sola en la crianza y venta de cerdos.

Trabaja ya cinco años en este negocio, comenzó en este negocio cuando se casó por la situación económica y por mejorar su calidad de vida, optó por el negocio de chanchos y de ganado. Es el quinto año consecutivo que trabaja con Fodemi, el actual crédito que solicta es para la compra de crías de cerdos para su crianza y engorde para posteriormente sacar a la venta, proceso que ayuda a que Cecilia incremente sus ventas e ingresos económicos para poder cubrir las necesidades diarias que tiene su familia.

Su sueño es poder construir su casa propia y seguir trabajando para sus hijos.
texts.en: Cecilia is a happy and hard-working young woman with a strong desire to move up in life. She lives with her husband and two children in San Gaabriel, northern Ecuador. She works by herself raising and selling pigs. She has been in the business five years and started after she married to improve her quality of life. This is her fifth year in a row working with Kiva partner FODEMI, and she is requesting the loan to purchase baby pigs to fatten and later sell, which will help her increase her income to cover her family's daily needs. Her dream is to be able to build her own home and to continue working for her children.

loans.use: to purchase baby pigs to fatten and later sell.

loans.name: Roin

texts.en:
Roin is 34 years old and lives in the village of Tobanieri, West Georgia with his family: wife – Mzia, 6-year-old daughter, 5-year-old son and parents (retired). 

Roin and Mzia lead the agricultural business of the family, which is the only source of the income for them, along with monthly pensions of Roin’s parents. The family is actively involved in dairy farming. They have seven milk cows and produce cheese, which is sold to local retailers. Also, the family grows potatoes, watermelons and nuts on a family-owned two hectares of land. Harvested fruits and vegetables are also sold to local green grocery retailers. Total average monthly income of the family is 700 Laris.

Roin requested credit for purchasing 800kg of potatoes for sowing. Also, a small part of the credit will be used for purchasing feed for his cows. This year, Roin plans to sow potatoes on a wider area, to get more harvest next year. He hopes that in spring he will have good harvest, which will be sold for a good price. The family will get more income, which will be used for improving their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes for sowing and feed for cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes

loans.name: Eriolyn

texts.en: Eriolyn works hard to support her family. She is married and has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 3 years now. She requested a PHP 11,500 loan through NWTF to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle. In the future, Eriolyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

loans.name: Esperanza De Jesús

texts.es: Esperanza de Jesús de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella tiene una venta de antojos de comida elaborados con elote,  tamales, atol, tortas entre otros, todo hecho con material de excelente calidad, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende tiene un sabor exquisito y lo da a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente siempre recibe a sus clientes con gran amabilidad; Esperanza es una mujer muy activa siempre se encuentra con ganas de trabajar, para ella la vida es un desafió y está dispuesta a enfrentarlo, es por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar Elotes por mayor. Esperanza de Jesús tiene fe que con su arduo trabajo logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Esperanza de Jesús is forty-six years old. She lives with her partner and her children in their own house. She sells snacks made with corn, such as tamales, atol [a thick corn drink], and corn cakes, among others. Everything is made with ingredients of excellent quality. She has earned a lot of customers because everything she sells has exquisite flavor and she sells at accessible prices. Also, her service is excellent because she always receives customers with great friendliness. Esperanza is a very active person and she is always ready to work. For her, life is a challenge and she is ready to face it. This is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow her to buy corn at wholesale price. Esperanza de Jesús has faith that with hard work she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale price

loans.name: Solange

texts.fr:
Mme SOLANGE est  mariée  et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé  a 28ans et  le moins âgé a 02ans. 02 vont   à l’école. Elle a 05 personnes  en charge.

Elle vend du riz préparé et du pain au sandwich (restauration) depuis 11ans. Elle s’approvisionne  au marché de pissy. Ses clients sont  les voisins et amis du quartier.

Elle veut  s’acheter  01 sac de riz, 01 bidon d’huile, 01 carton de tomate concentré, 60 miches de pain par jour et du poisson.

 Mme épargne  ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne  ouvrir un grand restaurant  et assurer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Mrs. SOLANCE is married and the mother of three children. The oldest is 28 and the youngest is 2.  Two of them attend school. She has five people in her care. 

She has been selling cooked rice and sandwiches (in food service) for 11 years. She gets her supplies at the market in Pissy.  Her customers are neighbors and friends in her area. 

She wants to buy one sack of rice, 1 can of oil, one case of tomato concentrate, 60 loaves of bread per day, and fish. 

Mrs. Solange saves her profits.  Her goal is to open a large restaurant and provide an education for her children.

loans.use: to buy one sack of rice, 1 can of oil, one case of tomato concentrate, 60 loaves of bread per day, and fish.

loans.name: Yony

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Yony; continua con su negocio de elaboración de pan para luego distribuirlo a sus clientes, la socia compra diferentes productos para la elaboración y fabricacion de de los panes productos como manteca, harina, azucar, levadura, el pago del horno y ella misma los elabora, la socia desea continuar su negocio y poder enviar los panes a la selva de perú donde tienen gran acogida; la socia en esta ocasión desea el credito para comprar ingredientes para la elaboración de panes.
texts.en: Yony continues with her business of making bread and distributing it to her customers. She buys different products for making and the bread, such as shortening, flour, sugar, yeast, and pays for use of the oven. She makes the breads herself. She wants to continue in her business and send the breads to the jungle in Perú, where they get a very favorable reception. This time she would like the loan so she can buy ingredients for making her breads.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making bread.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca is 47 years old and married with 4 children. With 2 children in school, Francisca works very hard to provide for them. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Francisca has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, sardines, soft drinks, etc. In the future she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Agustin

texts.es: Agustín compró mercancía con la que surtió el negocio y sus ventas aumentaron, en la actualidad su negocio está más surtido, y su nivel de vida se ve mejorado, Su meta es continuar su crecimiento y en un futuro tener una gran ferretería donde trabajen todos los miembros del hogar. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva con el que comprará nuevamente materiales que rotan facilmente,  tales como clavos, tornillos, raspadores, pintura, yeso, cemento, destornilladores, PVC tubos, lija etc.  Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente : “ Gracias por darme la oportunidad de acceder a un crédito con tan importante entidad y espero que cuando terminen este me otorguen otro.”
texts.en: Agustín bought merchandise that he used to stock his store and his sales increased. His business is now better stocked and his quality of life has improved. His goal is to continue this growth and, in the future, to have a large hardware store where members of his family can work. He is asking for a new Kiva Credit with which he will purchase materials that sell quickly, such as nails, screws, scrapers, paint, plaster, PVC tubing, sandpaper, etc. His message to those who fund Kiva is this: “Thank you for giving me the opportunity to access a loan with such an important institution and I hope that when I finish with this one [this loan] they will give me another.”

loans.use: to purchase nails, screws, sandpaper, paint, plaster, cement, PVC tubing, etc.

loans.name: Genara

texts.en:
Genara works hard to support her family. She is married and has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years now.

She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy spare parts for motorcycle maintenance. In the future, Genara would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for motorcycle maintenance.

loans.name: Sandro

texts.en:
Sandro is 45 years old, married and lives in the village, Kviani, with his 24 year old daughter and 85 year old mother. Sandro works at the local municipality. Along with his main job, he is actively involved in the family agricultural business. They have 3 milk cows and 1 calf. His daughter produces cheese and sells it on the local market. Along with the dairy farm Sandro has 6 bee-hives with bee-colonies. He sells gathered honey in the village. Total average monthly income of the family is 750 Laris, including the monthly pension of Sandro’s mother. 

Sandro has requested credit for purchasing seeds of maize. He will sow maize this year and sell harvest. This new business initiative will increase the income of the family. Family members will be able to purchase more household goods and, in turn, they will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase maize for sowing.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es: Ismael de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos. El posee un taller de mecánica el cual es muy visitado por las personas del lugar, últimamente ha aumentado la clientela pues tiene el mejor servicio con trabajo de calidad, a precios bajos; Ismael es un hombre dedicado al trabajo, muy  carismático y siempre se encuentra activo, le gusta estar adelante de la competencia para el Las metas e ideales que nos mueven, se generan a partir de las ganas de superarse, el está dispuesto a lograr sus sueños y es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que permita comprar herramientas, aceites, repuestos de carros entre otros. Ismael tiene la esperanza que así podrá darle a su familia seguridad economía.
texts.en: Ismael is 40 years old. He lives with his partner and their children. He has a mechanic shop that is very popular with people in the area. Lately he has increased his clientele because he has the best service and does good-quality work at low prices. Ismael is a man who is dedicated to his work, is very charismatic, and is always active. He likes to be ahead of the competition. For him, the goals and ideals that motivate him come from the desire to improve his situation. He is determined to achieve his dreams. This is why he decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy tools, oils, and replacement car parts, among other items. Ismael has the hope that in this way he will be able to give his family economic security.

loans.use: to buy tools, oils, and replacement car parts.

loans.name: Martine

texts.fr: Martine est âgée de 32 ans et vit au Bénin. Martine est mariée à un cuisinier du nom de joseph. Le couple a quatre enfants  tous scolarisés et à leur charge. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à charge. Les enfants vivent ensemble avec leurs parents. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux divers besoins de la famille, Martine vend depuis onze ans, divers produits (condiments et conserves) à son domicile. Parallèlement à cette activité, Martine  vend de la nourriture (haricot préparé). Martine s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Martine contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Martine sollicite un dixième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les neuf premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Martine is 32 years old and lives in Benin. She is married to a cook, Joseph. The couple has four children to support, who are all in school. They also look after another child. The children are all living at home with their parents and the couple both contribute to household costs. 

For 11 years, Martine has been selling various products (condiments and tinned goods) to help meet the family's needs. In addition to this business, Martine sells food (prepared beans). She buys her supplies in a market in Benin. 

Martine is able to contribute to her family's various expenses thanks to the income from her business. In order to respond to her customers' growing needs, Martine has requested a tenth loan from Alidé. Her previous nine loans have all been fully repaid.

loans.use: to buy various products (tinned goods, sauce, condiments, oil, trays of eggs, etc.).

loans.name: Ginalyn

texts.en: Ginalyn is 31 years old and married with 7 children. With 5 children in school, she works very hard to provide for them. Ginalyn runs an ambulant vending business (moving from place to place) of fermented shrimps in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell. She has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Ginalyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy additional stock to sell.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis de 30 años, convive con Orfelia, con quien tiene una hija de 2 años, María Esther. Todos ellos viven en una casa propia en la localidad de Santa Rosa de Palomar, distrito de San Luis de Shuaro, provincia de Chanchamayo (selva central).  Luis es un padre ejemplar. Se dedica a la agricultura, en 2 parcelas de terrenos tiene sembrado café y plátanos. De estos productos obtiene el dinero suficiente para darle a su familia una vida decente que cubra sus necesidades básicas. Ahora tiene planeado sembrar en media parcela, plantitas de café. El trabajo es duro y constante en el campo, y sus enseñanzas son fructíferas. Es así que Luis aprendió a diferenciar las enfermedades que amenazan a su café. Por ejemplo el “ojo de grillo”, que consiste en la quemadura de las hojas de café, formándose como círculos oscuros y la “arañera”, cuando afecta a las hojas secando los granos. Para Luis éstos fueron sus enemigos, a los que combatió con éxito en todos sus años como agricultor. En sus tiempos libres trabaja como jornalero en otras tierras para sus vecinos. Así no le falta el dinero. Su anhelo más cercano es ampliar su producción de café, lo que está empezando a concretizar con la nueva siembra de sus viveros. Más adelante aumentará sus extensiones de terrenos. Éste sería su préstamo número 5, que obtendrá de MFP. Se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Se siente contento y satisfecho con su banco comunal “Aroma de café”. Con el dinero, él podrá adquirir 7 bolsas de abonos orgánicos, también pagará a personal para la limpieza y cuidado de sus plantaciones de café.
texts.en: Luis is 30 years old. He lives with Orfelia, with whom he has a 2 year-old daughter, María Esther. They all live in their own house in the town of Santa Rosa de Palomar, in the district of San Luis de Shuaro, in the provinceof Chanchamayo (in the central jungle). Luis is an exemplary father. He works in agriculture on 2 parcels of land that he has planted in coffee and plantains. He obtains sufficient money from these products to give his family a decent life that covers the basic necessities. He is now planning to plant coffe seedlings on half of a parcel. Work in the countryside is hard and constant and his training is fruitful. This is how Luis learned to differentiate the diseases that threaten his coffee plants. For example, the “cricket eye,” which looks like a burn on the leaves of the coffee, making small dark spots, and “spider-ing,” which affects the leaves and dries out the coffee berries. These are Luis’ enemies, which he has successfully fought during his years as a farmer. In his free time he works as a laborer on lands for his neighbors. So, he is never short of money. His greatest desire is to increase his production of coffee, which he is beginning to make reality with the planting of his coffee seedling nursery. Eventually he will increase his amount of land. This will be the 5th loan he will obtain from Microfinanzas Prisma. He pledges to be punctual in the payment of his monthly repayments. He feels happy and satisfied with his communal bank, “Aroma de Café.” With the money he will buy 7 bags of organic compost and he will also pay workers to weed and care for his coffee plants.

loans.use: to buy 7 bags of organic fertilizer and to hire workers

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 50 years old and married with 7 children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell in her store.

Gloria has borrowed and paid 13 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from fish vending. She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Eliseo De Jesús

texts.es: Eliseo de Jesús de veintiocho años de edad vive con sus hijos en casa propia. El posee una panadería donde vende todo tipo de pan dulce y pan salado,  es un buen negocio y últimamente ha tenido mucha demanda, pues el pan que vende es muy rico, de buena calidad y a precio accesible, además el servicio es excelente siempre recibe a su clientela con una sonrisa en el rostro; Eliseo es muy carismático y trabajador  siempre está dispuesto a aprovechar sus oportunidades , el piensa que hay que fijar los ojos hacia adelante para estar siempre fijos en el futuro que queremos alcanzar, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, azúcar,  levadura, gas propano, bandejas etc. Eliseo de Jesús tiene la confianza que con su arduo trabajo lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Eliseo de Jesús is 28 years old and lives with his children in their own house. He has a bakery where he sells all types of sweet and savory breads. It is a good business and lately he has had a great deal of demand because his bread is very delicious, high-quality, and accessibly priced. His service is also excellent -- he always receives his customers with a smile on his face. Eliseo is very charismatic and hard-working and he is always ready to take advantage of opportunities. He thinks that we must always keep our eyes fixed ahead in order to stay focused on the future we want to achieve. This is why he asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy flour wholesale, as well as sugar, yeast, propane gas, trays, etc. Eliseo de Jesús is confident that with his hard work, he will succeed at providing his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour wholesale, as well as sugar, yeast, propane gas and trays

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es:
María vive con sus 4 hijos en Otavalo Provincia de Imbabura, es una persona felíz, optimista, luchadora en sus labores para sacar adelante a sus hijos.

María tiene una tienda de productos de consumo masivo, negocio que es el único ingreso económico para su familia, actualmente su negocio no tiene mucha variedad de producto es por eso que no tiene buenos ingresos para su familia, es por eso que realiza el primer crédito en Fodemi, crédito que invertirá en el abastecimiento de productos a su tienda, inversión que le servirá para captar clientes y mejorar sus ingresos y a su vez la calidad de vida de los suyos.

El sueño de María es poder ser administradora de su propio supermercado.
texts.en:
María lives with her 4 children in Otavalo, in the province of Imbabura. She a person who is happy, optimistic, and works hard to help her children get ahead.

María has a store that sells commonly consumed products. This business is the only income for her family. Currently the business doesn’t have much variety of products, which is why she doesn’t have a good income for her family. So, she is taking her first loan with Fodemi, which she will use to stock products for her store. This investment will serve to get her more customers and to improve her income and also the quality of life for her family.

María’s dream is to be the administrator of her own supermarket.

loans.use: to stock products for her store because she doesn't currently have much variety.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: La señora Patricia se dedica a la venta de comida cuenta con domicilio fijo y puesto de venta fijo, vende comida desde hace 4 años atrás, su esposo trabaja como chofer interdepartamental y pocas veces esta en su casa ya que por su trabajo tiene que viajar constantemente, ella sola se encarga del cuidado y atención de sus 3 hijos los cuales son todavía estudiantes, el dinero lo necesitan para poder hacerle mejoras a la cocina que tiene construida para su puesto de venta, su vivienda esta ubicada en la zona periurbana de la ciudad mas conocida como base aérea, la Sra. Patricia es una persona muy trabajadora se siente agradecida por la confianza brindada en la otorgación del crédito ya que esta es su única fuente de ingresos para mantener a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Patricia sells food and has done so for 4 years. She has a permanent home and place to sell. Her husband works as an inter-district driver. He is not at home much because he has to travel constantly for work. She takes care of their three children by herself. Their children are still in school.
 
She needs the loan to be able to make improvements to the kitchen that she has constructed for her food stall. 

Her home is located in the Periurbana zone in the city best known for its air base.

Patricia is a hardworking person and feels thankful for the confidence placed in her by granting the loan, since her food stall is the only source of income to support her children.

loans.use: repair her food stall's kitchen

loans.name: Rosa Beatriz

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Rosa Beatriz; La socia tiene tiene aún su terreno de cultivo de maíz, y tiene algunos animales vacunos, la socia también continua con su negocio de compra y venta de pescado, pollo, la socia desea invertir su credito en la compra de pollos para criar y en la venta.
texts.en: The borrower, Mrs. Rosa Beatriz, is still growing corn and raising cattle on her land.  She also continues to buy and sell fish and chicken.  With the loan she will buy chickens to raise and sell.

loans.use: To buy chickens to raise and sell.

loans.name: María Ofelia

texts.es: María Ofelia vive con sus hijos los cuales aun asisten a la escuela, ella posee una venta de tamales de elote un su residencia, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues María se caracteriza por ser una buena vendedora además el material que utiliza es de muy buena calidad y comercia a precios realmente accesibles, el servicio que le presta a sus clientes es excelente siempre tiene una sonrisa en el rostro; ella es muy trabajadora, con muchas metas para el futuro, piensa que la más grande motivación que tiene en el camino para el éxito es su familia y es con ese pensamiento positivo que quiere empezar a sentar las bases de su negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar Elote por mayor. María Ofelia tiene la esperanza que así le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Ofelia lives with her children who are still in school.  She sells corn tamales that she makes at home.  Lately she has increased her customer base because she is a good saleslady and uses only top quality ingredients.  Her prices are very good and her customers receive excellent service with a smile.  She is very hard-working and has many goals for the future.  He greatest motivation is the success of her family and with that positive thought in mind she wants to begin consolidating her business.  She has requested a loan through INTEGRAL which she will use to buy wholesale corn.  María Ofelia hopes that this will help provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy wholesale corn.

loans.name: Aura Del Carmen

texts.es: Aura Del Carmen es una emprendedora que emprendió su propio negocio de la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 5 años que tiene este medio de vida, uno de sus mayores desafíos ha sido que tiene que salir todos los días bajo el sol para ofrecer sus productos. Siempre le ha gustado ser una persona muy independiente. Aura Del Carmen, ya tiene un buen tiempo trabajando con Fundación y ha mantenido un excelente record crediticio, nos explica que atrvez del financiamiento ha aumentado tanto sus clientes como en  mercadería. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de calzado, cosméticos, bolsos, ropa en general entre otros. Aura desea ampliar su negocio cada día más y al mismo tiempo incrementar su inventario.
texts.en:
Aura del Carmen is an entrepreneur who started her own business selling general merchandise.  This has been her source of income for five years.  One of her greatest challenges is the fact that she has to go out every day in the hot sun to offer her products.  She always has enjoyed being very independent.  

Aura del Carmen has been working with the Fundación for a long time and has an excellent credit record.  She explains that the financing received has increased her customer base as well as her stock of merchandise.  This loan will be used to buy shoes, cosmetics, bags, and general clothing, among other items.  Aura wants to increase business daily, while increasing her inventory.

loans.use: To buy shoes, cosmetics, bags, general clothing, among other items.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es:
Trinidad, originaria de León, de 59 años de edad, madre soltera, tiene un hijo. Ella es comerciante, su nivel de estudio es bien básico pues solo finalizo el sexto grado de la primaria. Pero no ha dejado de buscar como progresar en la vida. Inicio su negocio de venta de comida en el año 1979. Con capital propio, sus primeros platillos fueron sopas en especial su famosa ¨Sopa de res¨ después vendió arroz aguado otro plato tradicional en la cocina nicaragüense este platillo tuvo mucha aceptación por parte de sus clientela tanto así que hoy en día es muy solicitado. Toda esta experiencia que tiene en el arte culinario la obtuvo cuando trabajo de cocinera en un restaurante, de ahí le surgió la idea de poner ella misma su negocio de vente de comida, pues gracias a esas negocio ha sobrevivido ella y su hijo quien le ayuda en el negocio. Hoy en día vende en el mercado central de la ciudad de León lleva 32 años dedicándose a esta actividad.  
Ella requiere el préstamo para compra de arroz, verduras, carnes, leña, aceite para elaborar sus deliciosos y apetecidos platillos. A ella les gustaría ir mejorando su casa poco a poco en especial la cocina que es donde se elaborar sus comidas, darle una mejor apariencia a su negocio para hacerlo mas atractivo al publica donde se brinde un buen servicio y las personas se sientan muy a gusto de estar ahí disfrutando la comida.
texts.en:
Trinidad, 59, is from León and single, and she has a son.  She is a merchant who got only as far as 6th grade in elementary school.  But that does not stop her from seeking ways to get ahead.  She started her food business in 1979 with her own capital.  The first dishes she offered were soups, especially her famous "Beef Soup".  Then she sold rice soup, another traditional Nicaraguan dish that became so popular among her customers that today it is number one on the list.  

Her expertise in culinary art was obtained working as a cook in a restaurant.  There she got the idea to set up her own food business which has provided her and her son with enough income to survive.  Currently she sells her goods at the central market in the city of León.  She has been in business for 32 years.

She is requesting a loan to buy rice, vegetables, meat, firewood and oil to make her delicious specialties.  She enjoys fixing up her house little by little, especially the kitchen which is where she cooks.  She wants to make her business more attractive to the public, offering good service and a place to enjoy her food.

loans.use: To buy rice, vegetables, meat, firewood and oil.

loans.name: Sopiko

texts.en:
Sopiko is 25 years old, married and lives in the village Norio, West Georgia with her family: her husband, George, and 2 daughters, 5 and 6 years old. All members of the family are internally displaced persons, as a reason of military conflict inside the country. George is a worker in the village. Sopiko is leading the family agricultural business, which is their important source of the income. The family has 2 milking cows. Sopiko produces cheese and sells it locally, to dairy products retailers. Also, the family owns a plot of the land, where 250 nut trees are grown. On season they sell up to 400 kg of nuts. The total average monthly income of the family is 700 Laris.

Sopiko has requested credit for the realization of a new business initiative. She plans to purchase an electrical oven for baking candy products. She will sell her products on the local market, as well as to local stores. According to her estimations, there is sufficient demand on the local market for candy products and her business will be profitable. Additional income will allow Sopiko to provide better living conditions for her children, as well as for George and herself.

loans.use: to purchase an electrical oven for baking candy products,

loans.name: Argenis De Jesus

texts.es: El señor Argenis es un carpintero quien desde muy joven aprendió este oficio y desde entonces lo practica en su propio taller ubicado en su casa localizada en el municipio de caldas ubicado al sur de la ciudad de Medellín. Antes de tener su propio taller, el señor Argenis trabajaba como operario en una empresa pero un accidente lo obligó a retirarse de su empleo, teniendo así que buscar la forma de trabajar para poder conseguir los ingresos para su sostenimiento y el de su esposa. El señor Argenis trabaja todos los días desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m con un conocido quien le ayuda en su taller. Para poder cumplir con los pedidos que tiene en su carpintería, el señor Argenis necesita de la compra de madera y herramienta de trabajo que le permita cumplir con los pedidos. El sueño del señor Argenis es ampliar su carpintería y brindarle una buena calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Argenis is a carpenter who learned the trade when he was very young.  Since then he has been working out of his workshop in his house, which is in the town of Caldas, south of the city of Medellín.  Before having his own workshop, Mr. Argenis worked as an operator for a private company but due to an accident had to retire and seek ways to earn an income to support his wife and himself.  

He works everyday from 7:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. with an acquaintance who helps him at the workshop.  In order to fill pending orders, Mr. Argenis must buy wood and tools for his work.  His goal is to expand his carpentry business and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy wood and tools such as hammers, a screwdriver and a drill.

loans.name: Ada Elizabeth

texts.es: Ada Elizabeth de treinta y siete años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hija. Ella hace trapeadores y ya es muy conocida en la zona, últimamente ha tenido más demanda pues su producto es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, además el servicio que presta es inigualable, lo más importante es la amabilidad ante todo;  Ada es una mujer emprendedora con grandes sueños para el futuro, uno de ellos es ver crecer su negocio y para ello quiere aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presenten, ella piensa que para lograr algo satisfactorio en la vida,  hay que hacerlo con esfuerzo y sacrificio, está dispuesta a correr el riesgo es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima tela por mayor. Ada Elizabeth tiene fe que con su esfuerzo podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ada Elizabeth is 37 years old and lives with her life partner and daughter. She makes mops and is already well known in her area. Lately she has had more demand for her product, since it is high quality at an accessible price. In addition, the service that she provides is unequaled. Most important is her friendliness towards everyone. 

Ada is an entrepreneurial woman with big dreams for the future. One of which is to see her business grow. To do so, she wants to take advantage of all the opportunities that present themselves. She thinks that to be satisfied with life, one must go forth with effort and sacrifice. She is ready to take risks, which is why she is asking Integral for a loan that would allow her to purchase wholesale raw material. Ada Elizabeth has faith that with her hard work, she will be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase wholesale fabric

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: Edgar  tiene 30 años. Es un hombre soltero y sin hijos. Vive con Dominga, su madre a quien cuida por su edad avanzada, en una casa propia en la localidad de Santa Rosa de Palomar, distrito de San Luis de Shuaro, provincia de Chanchamayo. Con coraje y fuerza, todos los días se dirige al campo. Edgar es agricultor. Con la producción de una hectárea y media de café y plátanos ha conseguido mejorar su casa y comprarse artículos para hacer más fácil su vida y la de su mamá. En la época de cosecha traslada sus granos de café hacia la ciudad de La Merced donde los vende con éxito. En sus ratos libres, trabaja como albañil en distintas obras. A veces los contratos son por 3 meses, asegurándole ingresos cada fin de mes. Los meses de noviembre, diciembre, enero y febrero, son cruciales en esta actividad por la cantidad de contratos. Está contento con su labor de agricultor y constructor. Entre sus prioridades está la salud de su madre, quizá más adelante logre formar una familia. No lo sabe. Pero le gusta las labores del campo, lo considera más gratificante. Es así que desea ampliar su producción, con la compra de más terrenos. Éste sería su primer préstamo de MFP. Por recomendación de sus amigos se unió al grupo comunal “Aroma de café”, e iniciará una labor solidaria con sus compañeros. Afirma ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. De obtener el dinero podrá comprar bolsas de abonos orgánicos para esparcirlos en sus cultivos de café. Así también pagará los servicios de jornaleros que trabajarán en sus tierras.
texts.en:
Edgar is thirty years old. He is a single man without children. He lives with his elderly mother, Dominga, who he cares for, in their own house in the town of Santa Rosa de Palomar, in the district of San Luis de Shuaro, in the province of Chanchamayo. With courage and strength, every day he goes to the fields.

Edgar is a farmer. With the yield from 1-1/2 hectares of coffee and bananas he has improved his house and bought items to make life easier for himself and his mother. At harvesting time he takes his coffee beans to the city of La Merced where he sells them successfully. 

In his free time he works various jobs as a mason. Sometimes his contracts are for 3 months, which assures him of income at the end of each month. The months of November, December, January and February are crucial in this activity because of the number of contracts. 

He is happy with his work as a farmer and a builder. 

Among his priorities is the health of his mother, and perhaps later he will have his own family. He does not know. But he likes working in the field, and considers it very rewarding. And so he would like to expand his harvest, with the purchase of more land. 

This will be his first loan through MFP. His friends recommended that he join the communal bank Aroma de Café, so he could begin to work united with his friends. He offers assurances that he will be punctual with his monthly payments. 

He will use the money from the loan to buy bags of organic fertilizer to scatter on the coffee plants. He will also pay the laborers who would work in the fields.

loans.use: to buy bags of organic fertilizer and to pay the field laborers

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer que le gusta salir adelante en su trabajo por sus hijos. Rosa vive con su esposo y sus 5 hijos en Otavalo, Provincia de Imbabura. Rosa tiene una tienda de víveres.

Empezó con este negocio hace un año, no tiene mucha variedad de productos lo que ocaciona que no tenga muchos clientes lo que genera bajas utilidades económicas, es por eso que realiza su primer crédito en Fodemi porque va a invertir en la compra de víveres para abastecer su negocio ya que por temporada de diciembre obtiene más ventas e ingresos económicos que le ayudarán a mejorar la calidad de vida.

El sueño de Rosa es poder tener su propio local y que sus hijos sigan estudiando.
texts.en:
Rosa is a woman that likes to advance in her work for her children. She lives with her husband and their 5 children in Otavalo, Imbabura Province. Rosa has a grocery store. 

She started the business a year ago. She does not have a lot of variety in her products, which causes her to have fewer customers and less profit. This is why she is taking out her first loan with FEDEMI. She is going to invest it in the purchase of groceries to stock her store. In the December season, she has better sales and income, which will help her improve her quality of life. 

Rosa’s dream is to have her own location and for her children to continue studying.

loans.use: stock her store with groceries since sales increase in December

loans.name: Namnam Awaou's Group

texts.fr: Le groupe AYIDOTE est composé de quatre personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Namnam Awaou est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Namnam Awaou est âgée de 47 ans et vit au Bénin. Namnam Awaou n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Namnam Awaou est mariée à un chauffeur du nom de Razack. Le couple a quatre enfants tous scolarisés et à sa charge. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à charge. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Namnam Awaou vend depuis vingt cinq ans environs, des ustensiles de cuisine dans un marché du Bénin. Namnam Awaou s’approvisionne au Nigéria. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Namnam Awaou sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AYIDOTE, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier prêt a été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The Ayidote group is made up of four people who all live in the same neighbourhood. This is the second time that the group have requested financial aid from Alidé in order to improve their business.

The head of the group, Namnam Awaou, has her hand raised in the photo. She is 47 years old and lives in Benin. Namnam Awaou did not go to school. She is married to a driver, Razack. The couple has four children to support who are all at school. They look after another child in addition to their own children. 

For 25 years, Namnam Awaou has been selling kitchen utensils at a market in Benin to support all the children in her care. She buys her supplies in Nigeria. In order to satisfy her customers and improve her turnover and revenue, Namnam Awaou is requesting a second loan from Alidé together with the members of the Ayidote group. The first loan has been repaid in full.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana Gloria de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos. Ella posee un taller de costura muy conocido en la zona donde reside, ya se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues su trabajo es de muy buena calidad y cose al gusto del cliente, blusas, vestidos, pantalones entre otros, las personas que llegan a solicitar del trabajo de Ana siempre quedan satisfechas  ya que utiliza material de excelente calidad y da precios accesibles;  Ana es una mujer de hogar, trabajadora con ganas de sacar adelante a su familia con grandes expectativas para un futuro, uno de sus más grandes secretos es la perseverancia en su labor, está dispuesta a darse la oportunidad de superarse es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor. Ana Gloria tiene la confianza que de esta forma podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una vida plena para su familia.
texts.en: Ana Gloria, 42, lives with her life partner and their three children.  She has a sewing workshop that is well-known in the neighborhood where she lives.  She already has a lot of customers due to the fact that her work is of very good quality, and she sews blouses, dresses, pants and other garments according to the tastes of her customers.  The people who seek out Ana's work always leave satisfied, since she uses very good quality material and charges very affordable prices.  Ana is a hardworking housewife who has a desire to get ahead with her family, and has high expectations for the future. One of the secrets of her success is her perseverance in her work, and she is ready to take this opportunity to succeed.  For this reason, she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy fabric at wholesale.  Ana Gloria has confidence that in this way she will be able to bring economic security to her household, and provide a full life for her family.

loans.use: to buy fabric at wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
Mariela de 59 años de edad vive en  la ciudad de Barranquilla y tiene 2 hijos en las edades de 30 y 41 años; allí se dedica a la venta de productos de aseo,  hace 2 años, cuando comenzó disponiendo un espacio en su habitación, desde donde vendía a sus vecinos. Con el tiempo y mediante su trabajo persistente, el negocio fue creciendo, su clientela se expandió y ya con la necesidad de un local, se arriesgó a adquirir uno mediante arriendo y con ello logró estabilizar su negocio;  a Mariela le ha ido muy bien, ella ha conseguido algunos contratos  que le ayudan gradualmente al incremento de su capital de trabajo. Su meta mas adelante es aprender a fabricar traperos y a elaborar desinfectantes, para darle un giro a su negocio y con esto  aumentará sus ganancias. 
Su mayor desafío es lograr un capital de trabajo suficiente,  para responder oportunamente, a la demanda del mercado, especialmente en el último trimestre del año,  cuando hay dinero disponible en el ambiente comercial y crecen sus ventas. Esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará en mayor cantidad, traperos, escobas y desinfectantes, para surtir su negocio y aprovechar las oportunidades que le ofrece la época decembrina.
texts.en:
Mariela, 59, lives in the city of Barranquilla and has two children, ages 30 and 41. She has been selling cleaning products since 2 years ago when she started using a space in her house to sell to her neighbors. With time and hard work the business grew, her clientele expanded, and needing more space she decided to risk renting a store, which helped her to stabilize her business. Things have gone well for Mariela: she has received some contracts that help her to gradually increase her business capital. Her goal is to learn to make mops and disinfectants which will take her business on a different route, and increase her earnings. 

Her major challenge is getting sufficient capital to be able to respond to the demands of the market, especially in the last trimester of the year when there is money available in the business sector and her sales go up. This is the reason why she requests a Kiva loan, her first loan from the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo. She will buy mops, brooms and cleaning products at wholesale to stock her store and take advantage of the opportunities of the holiday season.

loans.use: to buy mops, brooms and cleaning products in bulk.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es: José Luis de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos. El posee una venta de carteras de todo tipo, color y tamaño  todo al gusto del cliente, últimamente ha tenido más demanda, gracias a la calidad de su trabajo, además ocupa materiales de primera calidad y las vende a un buen precio; José Luis tiene un gran don y es un hombre totalmente dedicado a su trabajo, siempre está adelante de la competencia, tiene muchas metas y piensa que solo el hombre inteligente que sabe arriesgar y aprovechar las pocas o muchas oportunidades que se le presentan es el hombre que alcanza el verdadero éxito, está dispuesto a alcanzarlo es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar polietileno, hilo grueso, lana, adornos entre otros. José Luis tiene la confianza que de esta forma logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jose Luis, 46, lives with his wife and their children. He owns a business selling purses of all types, colors and sizes, depending on the customer's taste. Lately his demand has increased, thanks to the quality of his work, the good materials that he uses, and his affordable prices. Jose Luis has a great gift and is a man totally dedicated to his work. He is always ahead of the competition, has a lot of goals, and thinks that only an intelligent man who takes risks and takes advantage of whatever opportunities present themselves will be truly successful. He wants to achieve this, and so he asks INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy polyethylene, thick thread, yarn, decorations and other things. Jose Luis is confident that this will help him give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy polyethylene, thick thread, yarn and decorations.

loans.name: Senobia

texts.es:
Senobia es socia del Banco Comunal Wiñarisun, es socia de Finca Peru desde hace 16 años
Senobia siempre se dedicó a la venta de caldo, ella siempre estuvo en Finca desde que la invitaron no se retiró, esta muy agradecida por todo el apoyo que recibió de parte de la Morenita (Fundadora de FINCA Peru)y sus promotoras, las capacitaciones le ayudaron a poder mejorar como persona y en su negocio, gracias a los préstamos que obtuvo pudo construir su casa, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de arroz, fideos y carne.
texts.en: Senobia is a member of the “Wiñarisum” communal bank and has been a member of Finca Peru for 16 years. Senobia has always sold soup.  She’s been in Finca since she was invited and has never left.  She is very grateful for all the support she’s received from La Morenita (Founder of Finca Peru) and her promoters.  The training helped her to improve as a person and in her business.  Thanks to the loans she obtained she was able to build her house and will use this new loan to buy rice, noodles and meat.

loans.use: to buy rice, noodles and meat.

loans.name: Carlos Alejandro

texts.es:
Carlos es socio del Banco Comunal Wiñarisun, tiene 49 años, se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, es casado y tiene 6 hijos.
Carlos esta muy agradecido por que en Finca pudo desarrollarse como Padre y como negociante, con la carne que vende también le abastece a su esposa que vende carne en el mercado, recuerda todos los consejos de las capacitaciones y siempre trata de ser puntual, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de ganados.
texts.en: Carlos is a member of the “Wiñarisum” communal bank.  He’s 49 years old and is a livestock merchant.  He’s married and has six children.  Carlos is very grateful because in Finca he was able to develop both as a father and as a businessman.  He’s able to supply his wife with the meat he sells so she can sell it in the market.  He recalls all the advice from the training and always strives to be punctual.  He will use the current loan to buy livestock.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Juana Natividad

texts.es: La socia actualmente se dedica la compra y venta de patos, ella también desea invertir su credito en la compra de productos como son papas al por mayor, salchichas, un carrito salchipapero para incursionar en la venta de salchipapas, la socia esta muy anciosa por empezar y vera como le va el negocio, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y desea seguir creciendo y dar a sus hijos un buen ejemplo y calidad de vida; la socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de productos como papa, salchichas y un carrito salchipapero, ella prepara para la venta.
texts.en: Currently she is a duck merchant but she wants to use the loan to buy products like potatoes and sausages at wholesale and as well as a food cart to start selling ‘salchipapas’ [fast food consisting of fried potatoes and fried sausages].  She is very anxious to get started and see how she does in the business.  She is a very hardworking woman who wants to continue to grow to set a good example for her children and provide them with a good quality of life.  She is asking for the loan to buy potatoes, sausages and a food cart to get ready to start selling.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, sausages and a food cart.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
El señor Carlos Alberto es un hombre de 60 años y este es su segundo préstamo Kiva, con el primero ha logrado mucho incrementar sus ingresos gracias al mantenimiento que le realizó a su moto taxi alquilada, en esta oportunidad él desea poder comprarse su moto taxi propia y así poder tener los ingresos que tanto desea, lo que le permitirá ofrecerse una mejor calidad de vida.

Carlos es un hombre dedicado a su trabajo, él tiene 2 hijos que ya son mayores de edad y han cursado el nivel superior. A Carlos le gusta mucho escuchar música y es un fanático de los “Frejoles”. Él hubiese deseado estudiar Mecánica Automotriz pero debido a muchas circunstancias no lo pudo lograr, actualmente se encuentra alquilando una moto taxi que lo ha ayudado mucho en tener lo ingresos necesarios, trabaja aproximadamente un promedio de 9 horas y gana S/.50 diarios, algunos otros días gracias a la afluencia de gente puede ganar hasta S/.70. 

Él se esfuerza mucho para brindarles un buen servicio a sus clientes, además de dedicarse a su negocio también trabaja como cuidador de un Molino en la ciudad de Camaná, lugar en donde vive y trabaja, ubicada al sur del país, ciudad que disfruta a diario del Océano Pacífico, debido a que se encuentra a pocos metros de la ciudad.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto is a 60-year-old man and this is his second Kiva loan.  With the first one he was able to increase his income quite a bit thanks to the maintenance he was able to give his leased mototaxi.  On this occasion, he wants to be able to buy his own mototaxi so that he can earn the income he so desires that will make it possible for him to attain a better quality of life.

Carlos is a man who is dedicated to his work.  He has two children who are already adults and have gone to college.  Carlos very much enjoys listening to music and he’s a fan of the “Frejoles.” He would have liked to study auto mechanics but due to many circumstances was unable to do so.  

He currently leases a mototaxi that has helped him maintain the necessary income.  He works on average 9 hours and earns 50 soles per day.  On some days, due to larger numbers of people, he can earn up to 70 soles.

He strives mightily to provide good customer service.  In addition to this business he also works as a caretaker at a mill in the city of Camaná, the place where he lives and works, locate in the south of the country.  This is a city that enjoys the Pacific Ocean which is located just a few meters from the city.

loans.use: to buy a mototaxi.

loans.name: Emily Viky

texts.es:
Emily es socia del Banco Comunal Lucinda, tiene 23 años, es madre de 3 hijos y socia de Finca desde hace 1 año y medio.
Emily vende frutas en el Grifo de Ayacucho, estudia cosmetología, recuerda que empezó vendiendo comida en el Seguro de Salud, ella poco a poco pudo progresar, en el momento mas indicado recibió la invitación para pertenecer a Finca, ahora esta muy bien pudo cambiar de negocio y se siente mas tranquila, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la campaña navideña traerá juguetes. La meta que tiene es poder terminar sus estudios.
texts.en: Emily is a member of the “Lucinda” communal bank.  She’s 23 years old and the mother of three children.  She’s been a member of Finca for a year and a half.  Emily sells fruit in El Grifo Ayacucho and is studying cosmetology.  She recalls that she started out selling food at the health clinic and gradually was able to progress.  At the most propitious moment she received an invitation to join Finca and now she’s very good.  She was able to change business and she feels more tranquil.  She will use the loan to buy toys for the Christmas season.  Her goal is to complete her studies.

loans.use: to buy toys.

loans.name: María Odilia

texts.es: María Odilia de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una tortillería enfrente del lugar donde reside, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues su trabajo es de excelente calidad al igual que la materia prima, además los precios son muy accesibles; María es una mujer joven activa, que siempre está dispuesta a trabajar duro para lograr sus objetivos , piensa que para triunfar hay que hacerse ideas propias, conocer la realidad, pensar en la verdad y ser dueños de uno mismo para poder conquistar el mundo de afuera, ella está dispuesta a alcanzar ese triunfo es por eso que le solicita  a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. María Odilia tiene fe con su duro trabajo podrá darle una vida plena a su familia.
texts.en:
María Odilia, 34, lives with her life partner and their children.  She has a tortilla shop in front of her house.  Lately her clientele has grown due to the excellent quality of her raw materials; in addition, her prices are very affordable.

María is a young, active woman who is always willing to work hard to reach her objectives.  She believes that in order to succeed one must have original ideas, to be aware of one’s reality, to think truthfully and to be self-aware to conquer the outside world.  

She is set to reach this success and this is why she’s asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn at wholesale.  María Odilia trusts that with her hard work she’ll be able to give her family with a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale.

loans.name: Bonne Nouvelle Group

texts.fr: Le groupe BONNE NOUVELLE est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la troisième  fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de kossiwa est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. kossiwa est âgée de 27 ans et vit au Bénin. kossiwa n’a pas fréquenté l’école. kossiwa est mariée à un certain Bruno. Le couple a un enfant scolarisé et à leur charge. En plus de leur enfant, le couple a trois autres enfants à charge. kossiwa vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants.  Le couple assure ensemble les divers besoins de la famille. Afin d'assurer les diverses charges de la famille, kossiwa vend depuis quinze environs des friperies pour enfants par le système de distribution et de manière ambulante. kossiwa s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, kossiwa sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe BONNE NOUVELLE, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group Bonne Nouvelle ("good news") is made up of three people living in the same neighbourhood. This is the third time they have requested financial assistance from Alidé to improve their business. The group's representative, Kossiwa, has her hand raised in the photo. 

Kossiwa is 27 years old and lives in Benin. She did not go to school. She is married to a man named Bruno. The couple has one child to support, who goes to school. As well as their child, they look after three other children. Kossiwa lives with her husband and the children. 

The couple together provide for the various needs of their family. Kossiwa supports the family by working as an itinerant vendor selling children's second-hand clothing. She buys her supplies at a market in Benin. In order to satisfy her customers and increase her turnover and revenue, Kossiwa is requesting a third loan from Alidé along with the other members of the group Bonne Nouvelle. The first two loans have been fully repaid.

loans.use: to buy bundles of second-hand clothing.

loans.name: María Matilde

texts.es:
María tiene 32 años, es una persona responsable en su trabaja, felíz, luchadora y con muchas gans de sacar adelante a sus hijos. María vive con sus cuatro hijas en Otavalo, Provincia de Imbabura.

María trabaja sola en la confección de anacos (faldas de vestimenta indígena), este es su única fuente de ingresos para mantener a sus hijos y en este negocio hay mucha competencia, por eso vió la necesidad de realizar su primer crédito en Fodemi ya que quiere invertir en Tela para que incremente su producción y ofrecer un precio competitivo en el mercado, proceso que ayudará a María a cubrir las necesidades de sus hijas en cuanto a alimentación y estudio, también podrán mejorar su calidad de vida.

El sueño de María es poder dar la educación a todas sus hijas.
texts.en:
María, 32, is a responsible person at work.  She is happy and tenacious and very much wants to move her children forward.  María lives with her four daughters in Otavalo, Imbabura Province.

María works alone making ‘anacos’ (traditional, indigenous skirts) and this is her only source of income to support her children.  There is a lot of competition in this business and this is why she needed to take out her first Fodemi loan to buy fabric to increase production and offer a competitive market price, a process that will help María cover her daughters’ needs with respect to food and schooling; they will also be able to improve their quality of life.  María’s dream is to be able to provide schooling for all of her daughters.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Trinidad; continua con su negocio de compra y venta de ganados vivos que luego lo distribuye a sus clientes y a personas que le solicitan; La socia tiene su local en el cual vende carne de vacuno, la socia compra al por mayor los ganados vivos y los degolla para vender en su carnicería, en esta ocasión la socia desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de ganados vacunos para la venta; la socia desea implementar a futuro i ampliar su local para cubrir la demanda de sus clientes, la socia también comprar maquinaria para trozar y cortar la carne.
texts.en: Trinidad continues with her business buying and selling cattle that she buy live and then sells to customers and to people who request it.  She has a butcher shop where she sells beef.  She buys live cattle at wholesale that she butchers to sell in her butcher shop.  On this occasion she wants to buy cattle to sell.  In the future, she’d like to enlarge her shop to cover customer demand.  She also wants to buy machinery to butcher and cut the meat.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Haifa

texts.en: Haifa is a 38-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan. She is the mother of three children. Haifa is requesting a loan of 1500 Jordanian dinars to purchase perfumes and makeup products for trading purposes. Haifa aspires to increase her customer base and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes and makeup products for trading purposes

loans.name: Ana Elizabeth

texts.es: Ana Elizabeth de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive con su hijo en casa propia. Ella posee un taller de costura, realiza todo tipo de prendas como blusas, camisas, pantalones, vestidos entre otros, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues el trabajo que realiza es de muy buena calidad y vende a excelentes precios ; Ana es una mujer emprendedora con muchas metas por alcanzar, siempre está dispuesta a trabajar duro, se levanta desde muy temprano a confeccionar la ropa, le gusta estar adelante de la competencia por eso se mantiene siempre a la vanguardia, piensa que la motivación es lo que te ayuda a empezar pero el habito es el que te mantiene firme en tu camino, tiene ese habito de trabajo es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor. Ana Elizabeth tiene la esperanza que así podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Elizabeth, 45, lives with her daughter in her own house.  She has a sewing shop where she makes all types of articles of clothing like blouses, shirts, pants and dresses, among others.  Lately her clientele has grown because the work she does is very good quality and she sells at excellent prices. 

Ana is an enterprising woman with many goals to reach.  She is always willing to work hard.  She rises very early to start making clothes.  She likes to stay ahead of her competition so she’s always on the cutting-edge.  She believes that motivation is what gets you started but habit is what keeps you firmly on the path.  

She possesses that work habit and that’s why she decided to request an INTEGRAL loan that will make it possible for her to buy fabric at wholesale.  Ana Elizabeth hopes that she’ll be able to provide economic security for her home and a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy fabric at wholesale.

loans.name: Luz Eliana

texts.es: La socia es la Sra. Luz Eliana; La socia continua con su negocio de elaboración de pan, la socia compra los ingredientes como son manteca, harina, levadura entre otros productos y los prepara y alquila el horno y una vez que obtiene los panes los coloca en su canasta familiar para llevarlosa vender desde muy temprano en la misma plaza principal del poblado y aqui paran todos los buses, combis, taxis, carros particulares que van desde Cusco a  la ciudad de Arequipa, Puno, Puerto Maldonado. La socia en esta ocasión desea invertir en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de panes.
texts.en: Luz Eliana continues with her bread baking business.  She buys ingredients like shortening, flour and yeast, among other products.  She prepares the bread and leases an oven.   Once she obtains the bread she puts them into a family basket and goes out to sell them very early in her town’s square where buses, taxis, cooperative taxis and private vehicles stop on their trip from Cusco to Arequipa, Puno and Puerto Maldonado.  On this occasion, she wants to buy ingredients to make bread.

loans.use: to buy bread baking ingredients.

loans.name: Alba Arely

texts.es: Alba Arely de treinta y seis años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una tienda en el lugar de su residencia donde vende productos de primera necesidad, es muy conocida por las personas de la zona, pues siempre encuentran ahí lo que necesitan, además el negocio está muy surtido de productos de excelente calidad y los vende a muy buenos precios; Alba es una mujer muy trabajadora le gusta estar siempre adelante de su competencia, sus más grandes secretos son la constancia y la dedicación solo así podrá alcanzar el éxito, quiere ver crecer su negocio y no le importa los riegos es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, pan, producto instantáneo, bebidas entre otros. Alba Arely tiene la confianza que de esta forma logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Alba Arely is thirty-six years old. She lives with her life partner and their children. She has a store in the place where she lives, where she sells basic goods. She is well-known among the people of the area, since they always find what they need in her store. In addition, the business is well-stocked with products of excellent quality, and she sells them for very good prices. Alba is a very hard-working woman who enjoys always being ahead of the competition. Her greatest secrets are perseverance and dedication; only in this way will she be able to achieve success. She wants to see her business grow, and she is not worried about the risks. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy staple foods, snacks, bread, instant products and beverages, among other items. Alba Arely is confident that in this way she will be able to provide her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy staple foods, snacks, bread, instant products and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
